summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of AMC Expiry Alerts Dashboard and Service Visit Calendar. Both features are fully functional with all UI components, interactions, and navigation working correctly.
seed_data_creation: None - used existing AMC contract (Saama Technologies)
